summary: "Immersive Armors Main Menu Replacer" changes what you see when you launch the game. It automatically rotates between a compilation of fantastic Immersive Armors related screenshots so it's different every time you play Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Zg3o4o0.png[/img]

[center]An automated rotating main menu replacer mod by Hothtrooper44. [/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/77V8qxc.png[/img]
Every now and then someone captures a truly legendary screenshot. Even more rarely, that legendary screenshot happens to be of one of the armors from the Immersive Armors pack. With an almost impossibly low chance, a truly legendary screenshot of one of the armors from the Immersive Armors pack also has the right composition to work as a main menu screen.

Over the last 13 months I have collected my favorite screenshots taken of my mods and of work included in my compilation mods. I present to you some of my favorites in one neat, automatically rotating, one-click install package!

This mod [color=red]Requires SKSE[/color]. I wanted to use more than one screenshot and SKSE is required to make the screenshots rotate every time you play Skyrim. There are currently 29 screenshots in this pack and I intend to expand upon it over time. This mod also removes the smoke from load screens so you can actually see the pretty pictures. As a side benefit, the smoke removal will improve performance during loading.

[center][youtube]KKRMYSfDqVA[/youtube][/center]
Thank you to the amazing community of players who use my mods and take screenshots of their journeys through Skyrim. It is very rewarding to see that people use and enjoy my work.

Feedback on the screenshots used should be left in the comments section. I will read all the comments made and consider requests for alterations and screenshot additions!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/bTogOms.png[/img]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/BYi7KBy.png[/img]
You may ask me for permission to use parts of this mod, but I will likely re-direct you to whoever made the asset in question. Though I made this mod, many of the parts were made by others!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/1uQcbj6.png[/img]
Hothtrooper44 - Immersive Armors Main Menu Replacer
LLFBandit - SKSE randomizer plugin
hellstorm102 - mesh used to apply the screenshots on
IceKK - the idea of deleting mesh in the load screen smoke nif
Bethesda - Skyrim and its assets
[center][b][color=orange]Screenshots by:[/color][/b]
Stenar1000

(There are still 4 images I can't locate the author of! Please let me know if you took one of these shots and I did not list you.)[/center]
